description: This file defines an API route for searching recipes in a FastAPI application. It includes an endpoint that accepts various query parameters for filtering recipes and returns paginated results.

methods.name: Page[RecipePublic] search( q: str | None = Query(None), tags: list[str] | None = Query(None), cuisine: str | None = Query(None), time_max: int | None = Query(None, ge=1), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), service: Annotated[SearchService, Depends(search_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to search recipes with optional filters and pagination, returning a paginated list of RecipePublic objects.

ctags.name: search
ctags.signature: ( q: str | None = Query(None), tags: list[str] | None = Query(None), cuisine: str | None = Query(None), time_max: int | None = Query(None, ge=1), page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), service: Annotated[SearchService, Depends(search_service)] = None, )
